Augment {1} [i]({1}: Put a charge counter on this card. Augment only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of charge counters on Mask of Insanities. You may cast any number of instant or sorcery cards from among them with converted mana cost less than the number of charge counters on Mask of Insanities without paying their mana costs.
Equip–Discard your hand.
